definition: to have a competition/to measure with one's hand or arm/to make a gesture of measuring
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: The result of the competition exceeded our expectation.
sentences.chinese: 比试的结果超过了我们的预期值。

definition: martial arts competition/tournament/to compete in a contest
to compare notes/to learn from one another/to swap pointers
single-elimination open tournament (the winner stays on until he is himself defeated)
elevated stage on which martial competitions or duels were held/arena/ring
to invite the groom (who will live with the bride's family)/to take a wife by one's own choice
unable to determine victory or defeat (idiom); evenly matched/to come out even/to tie/to draw
